basic.Target Organism: Fungi:Botrytis cinerea (MIC=20 µM), Fusarium oxysporum (MIC=20 µM), Aspergillus niger (MIC=41 µM), Candida albicans 01U (MIC=13 µM), C. albicans 38U (MIC=7 µM), C. parapsilosis (MIC=105 µM), C. neoformans strain L26 (MIC=209 µM), C. neoformans strain L30 (MIC=209 µM), Trichophyton rubrum (MIC=3 µM).
